questions.questionEn: What is the value of √(225) + √(169)?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn: Find the odd one out from the given options: Pen, Marker, Pencil, Crayon.
questions.questionHi: दिए गए विकल्पों में से विषम को चुनें: पेन, मार्कर, पेंसिल, क्रेयॉन।
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Pen, Marker, and Crayon are all used with ink or pigment. Pencil is the odd one out because it uses graphite.

questions.questionEn: A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series. 5, 12, 26, 54,?
questions.questionHi: एक श्रृंखला दी गई है जिसमें एक पद लुप्त है। दिए गए विकल्पों में से सही विकल्प का चयन करें जो श्रृंखला को पूरा करेगा। 5, 12, 26, 54,?
questions.subject: reasoning

questions.questionEn: In a certain code language, 'APPLE' is coded as 'BQQMF'. How will 'MANGO' be coded in that language?
questions.questionHi: एक निश्चित कूट भाषा में, 'APPLE' को 'BQQMF' के रूप में कूटबद्ध किया जाता है। उसी भाषा में 'MANGO' को कैसे कूटबद्ध किया जाएगा?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The pattern is to increment each letter by one in the alphabet. A→B, P→Q, L→M, E→F. Similarly, M→N, A→B, N→O, G→H, O→P. So, MANGO is NBOHP.

questions.questionEn: Pointing to a man, a woman said, 'He is the only son of my father-in-law's son'. How is the man related to the woman?
questions.questionHi: एक आदमी की ओर इशारा करते हुए, एक महिला ने कहा, 'वह मेरे ससुर के बेटे का इकलौता बेटा है।' वह आदमी उस महिला से कैसे संबंधित है?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The 'father-in-law's son' is her husband. The only son of her husband is her son.

questions.questionEn: Statements: All bags are books. All books are pencils. Conclusions: I. All bags are pencils. II. All pencils are books.
questions.questionHi: कथन: सभी बैग किताबें हैं। सभी किताबें पेंसिल हैं। निष्कर्ष: I. सभी बैग पेंसिल हैं। II. सभी पेंसिलें किताबें हैं।
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: All bags ⊂ books and all books ⊂ pencils, so all bags ⊂ pencils (I follows). But II does not follow.

questions.questionEn: Which diagram best represents the relationship between: 'Animals', 'Tigers', and 'Cats'?
questions.questionHi: कौन सा आरेख 'जानवर', 'बाघ' और 'बिल्ली' के बीच के संबंध को सबसे अच्छे से दर्शाता है?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Tigers ⊂ Animals, Cats ⊂ Animals, but Tigers and Cats are separate sets inside Animals.

questions.questionEn: Four friends P, Q, R, and S are sitting in a row facing north. S is not at an end. P is to the right of Q. R is third to the left of P. Who is at the far left end?
questions.questionHi: चार मित्र P, Q, R, और S एक पंक्ति में उत्तर की ओर मुख करके बैठे हैं। S एक छोर पर नहीं है। P, Q के दाईं ओर है। R, P के बाईं ओर तीसरा है। सबसे बाईं ओर कौन बैठा है?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Arrangement: R–S–Q–P. Hence, R is at the far left end.

questions.questionEn: Select the correct combination of mathematical signs to replace the * signs and balance the given equation: 18 * 6 * 4 * 2 = 5
questions.questionHi: दिए गए समीकरण को संतुलित करने के लिए * चिह्नों को प्रतिस्थापित करने के लिए गणितीय चिह्नों का सही संयोजन चुनें: 18 * 6 * 4 * 2 = 5
questions.subject: reasoning

questions.questionEn: From the given options, find the correct water image of the figure.
questions.questionHi: दिए गए विकल्पों में से, आकृति का सही जल प्रतिबिंब ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Water image = vertical inversion (top ↔ bottom).

questions.questionEn: Find the odd one out from the given options: 12, 18, 25, 30.
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: All are divisible by 6 except 25.

questions.questionEn: Complete the series: B, D, G, K, ?
questions.questionHi: श्रृंखला को पूरा करें: B, D, G, K,?
questions.subject: reasoning

questions.questionEn: In a certain code language, 'BASKET' is coded as '211911520'. How will 'MOTHER' be coded in that language?
questions.questionHi: एक निश्चित कूट भाषा में, 'BASKET' को '211911520' के रूप में कूटबद्ध किया जाता है। उसी भाषा में 'MOTHER' को कैसे कूटबद्ध किया जाएगा?
questions.subject: reasoning

questions.questionEn: Find the next term in the series: 3, 7, 13, 21, ?
questions.questionHi: श्रृंखला में अगला पद ज्ञात कीजिए: 3, 7, 13, 21,?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Differences: +4, +6, +8, +10 → next = 31.

questions.questionEn: Statements: Some shirts are pants. All pants are jackets. Conclusions: I. Some jackets are shirts. II. All shirts are jackets.
questions.questionHi: कथन: कुछ शर्ट पैंट हैं। सभी पैंट जैकेट हैं। निष्कर्ष: I. कुछ जैकेट शर्ट हैं। II. सभी शर्ट जैकेट हैं।
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Some pants are shirts → those pants are jackets too → Some jackets are shirts (I follows). II doesn’t follow.

questions.questionEn: If 'S' denotes '+', 'T' denotes 'x', 'U' denotes '÷', and 'V' denotes '-', then what is the value of 5 T 6 S 12 U 4 V 3?
questions.questionHi: यदि 'S' का अर्थ '+', 'T' का अर्थ 'x', 'U' का अर्थ '÷' और 'V' का अर्थ '-' है, तो 5 T 6 S 12 U 4 V 3 का मान क्या है?
questions.subject: reasoning

questions.questionEn: Ram is facing East. He turns 100° clockwise and then 145° anti-clockwise. In which direction is he facing now?
questions.questionHi: राम का मुख पूर्व की ओर है। वह 100° दक्षिणावर्त और फिर 145° वामावर्त घूमता है। अब उसका मुख किस दिशा में है?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Net turn = 145° - 100° = 45° anti-clockwise from East → North-East.

questions.questionEn: Select the option that can replace the question mark in the following series. 8, 12, 18, 27,?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित श्रृंखला में प्रश्न चिह्न को प्रतिस्थापित करने वाले विकल्प का चयन करें। 8, 12, 18, 27,?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The pattern is to multiply the previous number by 1.5. $8 \times 1.5 = 12$, $12 \times 1.5 = 18$, $18 \times 1.5 = 27$. So, $27 \times 1.5 = 40.5$.

questions.questionEn: A figure is embedded in one of the given options. Find that option.
questions.questionHi: एक आकृति दिए गए विकल्पों में से एक में अंतर्निहित है। उस विकल्प को ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The given figure, a triangle and a rectangle, is contained as a part of the figure in option A.

questions.questionEn: Which word will appear fourth in a dictionary?
questions.questionHi: शब्दकोश में कौन सा शब्द चौथे स्थान पर आएगा?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The words will be arranged alphabetically as follows: Pigment, Pigeon, Pistol, Piston. Thus, Piston is fourth.

questions.questionEn: How many triangles are there in the given figure?
questions.questionHi: दी गई आकृति में कितने त्रिभुज हैं?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: This figure contains a total of 12 triangles. There are 8 small triangles, and 4 large triangles formed by combining smaller ones.

questions.questionEn: Select the set in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following set: (3, 24, 4)
questions.questionHi: उस सेट का चयन करें जिसमें संख्याएं उसी तरह से संबंधित हैं जैसे निम्नलिखित सेट की संख्याएं हैं: (3, 24, 4)
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The logic is: (First number * Third number) * 2 = Second number. For the given set: $(3 \times 4) \times 2 = 24$. Similarly, in option (d), $(4 \times 9) \times 2 = 72$.

questions.questionEn: Introducing Rekha, Vimal said, 'Her mother is the only daughter of my mother.' How is Vimal related to Rekha?
questions.questionHi: रेखा का परिचय कराते हुए विमल ने कहा, 'उसकी माँ मेरी माँ की इकलौती बेटी है।' विमल, रेखा से कैसे संबंधित है?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: 'My mother's only daughter' is Vimal's sister. Rekha's mother is Vimal's sister. So, Vimal is Rekha's maternal uncle.

questions.questionEn: From the given options, find the correct mirror image of the word 'PENCIL'.
questions.questionHi: दिए गए विकल्पों में से, 'PENCIL' शब्द का सही दर्पण प्रतिबिंब ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: In a mirror image, the figure or word is inverted horizontally. The left and right sides are interchanged. The mirror image of PENCIL is LIƆИƎꟼ.

questions.questionEn: A paper is folded and cut as shown in the figures. How will it look when unfolded?
questions.questionHi: एक कागज को मोड़ा और काटा जाता है जैसा कि आकृतियों में दिखाया गया है। खोलने पर यह कैसा दिखेगा?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The cuts and holes will appear symmetrically on the paper when unfolded along the fold lines. The final shape will have four holes in a diamond pattern.

questions.questionEn: Which planet is known as the 'Earth's Twin'?
questions.questionHi: किस ग्रह को 'पृथ्वी का जुड़वाँ' कहा जाता है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Venus is often called the Earth's Twin because of its similar size, mass, and density to Earth.

questions.questionEn: Who wrote the play 'Nil Darpan' which exposed the exploitation of indigo farmers?
questions.questionHi: नील किसानों के शोषण को उजागर करने वाला नाटक 'नील दर्पण' किसने लिखा था?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Dinabandhu Mitra wrote the famous play 'Nil Darpan' in 1860, which highlighted the brutal exploitation of the indigo farmers by the British planters.

questions.questionEn: The Dandi March was started by Mahatma Gandhi in which year?
questions.questionHi: महात्मा गांधी द्वारा दांडी मार्च किस वर्ष शुरू किया गया था?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The Dandi March, also known as the Salt Satyagraha, was an act of nonviolent civil disobedience led by Mahatma Gandhi from March to April 1930.

questions.questionEn: Which article of the Indian Constitution provides for the establishment of a Finance Commission?
questions.questionHi: भारतीय संविधान का कौन सा अनुच्छेद वित्त आयोग की स्थापना का प्रावधान करता है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Article 280 of the Indian Constitution provides for the establishment of a Finance Commission to recommend the distribution of tax revenues between the Union and the States.

questions.questionEn: What is the primary function of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI)?
questions.questionHi: भारतीय रिज़र्व बैंक (RBI) का प्राथमिक कार्य क्या है?
options: Issuing currency and maintaining monetary stability
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The primary function of the RBI is to issue and regulate the supply of currency notes and coins, and to maintain monetary stability in the country. It is known as the 'bankers' bank'.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following decomposition reactions is NOT a redox reaction?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सी अपघटन अभिक्रिया रेडॉक्स अभिक्रिया नहीं है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: A redox (reduction-oxidation) reaction involves a change in oxidation states. In the decomposition of calcium carbonate (CaCO3 → CaO + CO2), the oxidation states of Calcium, Carbon, and Oxygen do not change. Therefore, it is not a redox reaction.

questions.questionEn: Which gas is the main component of 'Gobar Gas' (Biogas)?
questions.questionHi: गोबर गैस (बायोगैस) का मुख्य घटक कौन सी गैस है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Methane (CH4) is the primary component of biogas, typically making up 50% to 75% of the total volume. It is produced by the anaerobic digestion of organic matter.

questions.questionEn: The first Jute mill in India was established at which place?
questions.questionHi: भारत में पहला जूट मिल किस स्थान पर स्थापित किया गया था?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The first jute mill was established at Rishra, near Kolkata, in 1855 by George Auckland.

questions.questionEn: Savitribai Phule, a social reformer and feminist, belonged to which state of India?
questions.questionHi: सावित्रीबाई फुले, एक समाज सुधारक और नारीवादी, भारत के किस राज्य से थीं?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Savitribai Phule was a prominent Indian social reformer, educationalist, and poet from Maharashtra. She is considered a pioneer of the feminist movement in India.

questions.questionEn: Which is the largest river basin in India?
questions.questionHi: भारत में सबसे बड़ा नदी बेसिन कौन सा है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The Ganga Basin is the largest river basin in India, covering about 25% of the country's total land area.

questions.questionEn: Karaikal, a major port city, is located in which Union Territory of India?
questions.questionHi: कराईकल, एक प्रमुख बंदरगाह शहर, भारत के किस केंद्र शासित प्रदेश में स्थित है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Karaikal is one of the four constituent parts of the Union Territory of Puducherry.

questions.questionEn: In which year was Project Tiger launched in India?
questions.questionHi: भारत में प्रोजेक्ट टाइगर किस वर्ष शुरू किया गया था?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Project Tiger was launched in 1973 to protect tigers and their habitats in India.

questions.questionEn: Who has been appointed as the chairperson of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) as of April 2024?
questions.questionHi: अप्रैल 2024 तक भारतीय प्रतिभूति और विनिमय बोर्ड (SEBI) के अध्यक्ष के रूप में किसे नियुक्त किया गया है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Madhabi Puri Buch was appointed as the chairperson of SEBI in March 2022. She is the first woman to hold this position.

questions.questionEn: The Revolutionary Socialist Party was established in which year?
questions.questionHi: रिवोल्यूशनरी सोशलिस्ट पार्टी की स्थापना किस वर्ष हुई थी?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The Revolutionary Socialist Party, a communist party, was founded on 19 March 1940 by Tridib Chaudhuri.

questions.questionEn: What is the pH value of lemon juice expected to be?
questions.questionHi: नींबू के रस का पीएच मान कितना होने की उम्मीद है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Lemon juice is acidic in nature. A substance with a pH less than 7 is acidic. Therefore, the pH of lemon juice is less than 7.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following is an example of a folk dance from the Bundelkhand region, performed on joyful occasions?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा बुंदेलखंड क्षेत्र का एक लोक नृत्य है, जो खुशी के अवसरों पर किया जाता है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Badhai Dance is a folk dance from the Bundelkhand region of Madhya Pradesh, performed to celebrate joyful events like weddings or childbirth.

questions.questionEn: The first Lok Sabha elections were held in which year?
questions.questionHi: पहले लोकसभा चुनाव किस वर्ष आयोजित किए गए थे?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The first general elections to the Lok Sabha in independent India were held from 25 October 1951 to 21 February 1952.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following cities is known as the 'Silicon Valley of India'?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से किस शहर को 'भारत की सिलिकॉन वैली' के नाम से जाना जाता है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Bengaluru is widely regarded as the 'Silicon Valley of India' due to its status as the nation's leading information technology exporter.

questions.questionEn: What is the primary objective of the 'Kudumbashree' program?
questions.questionHi: 'कुटुंबश्री' कार्यक्रम का प्राथमिक उद्देश्य क्या है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Kudumbashree is a poverty eradication and women's empowerment program implemented by the State Poverty Eradication Mission (SPEM) of the Government of Kerala.

questions.questionEn: Which ancient ruler of the Chola family captured the Kaveri delta from the Muttaraiyar in the mid-ninth century?
questions.questionHi: नौवीं शताब्दी के मध्य में किस प्राचीन चोल शासक ने मुत्तरैयार से कावेरी डेल्टा पर कब्जा कर लिया था?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Vijayalaya, who belonged to the ancient chiefly family of the Cholas from Uraiyur, captured the Kaveri delta from the Muttaraiyar in the middle of the ninth century.

questions.questionEn: The color of urine is yellow because of the presence of which pigment?
questions.questionHi: किस वर्णक की उपस्थिति के कारण मूत्र का रंग पीला होता है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The yellow color of urine is due to the pigment Urochrome, which is a byproduct of the breakdown of old red blood cells.

questions.questionEn: Who was the first Indian woman to scale Mount Everest?
questions.questionHi: माउंट एवरेस्ट को फतह करने वाली पहली भारतीय महिला कौन थीं?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Bachendri Pal became the first Indian woman to scale Mount Everest in 1984.

questions.questionEn: Who founded the Arya Samaj, a Hindu reform movement?
questions.questionHi: आर्य समाज, एक हिंदू सुधार आंदोलन, की स्थापना किसने की थी?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The Arya Samaj was founded by Swami Dayanand Saraswati in 1875 to reform Hindu religion.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following animals has a single opening in their digestive system that serves as both a mouth and an anus?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से किस जानवर के पाचन तंत्र में एक ही द्वार होता है जो मुंह और गुदा दोनों के रूप में कार्य करता है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Phylum Platyhelminthes (flatworms) have a single digestive system opening that functions as both a mouth and an anus, and they lack a circulatory system.

questions.questionEn: Who among the following was the first chairman of the Planning Commission of India?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन भारत के योजना आयोग के पहले अध्यक्ष थे?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The Planning Commission of India was established in 1950, and the Prime Minister of India serves as its ex-officio chairman. Thus, Jawaharlal Nehru was the first chairman.

questions.questionEn: What is the simplified value of $\frac{1}{2} \div \frac{1}{2} \text{ of } \frac{1}{2} + \frac{1}{2} \times \frac{1}{2} \div \frac{1}{2}$?
questions.questionHi: $\frac{1}{2} \div \frac{1}{2} \text{ का } \frac{1}{2} + \frac{1}{2} \times \frac{1}{2} \div \frac{1}{2}$ का सरलीकृत मान क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Following the BODMAS rule, first solve 'of': $\frac{1}{2} \text{ of } \frac{1}{2} = \frac{1}{4}$. Then the expression becomes $\frac{1}{2} \div \frac{1}{4} + \frac{1}{2} \times \frac{1}{2} \div \frac{1}{2} = 2 + \frac{1}{2} = 2.5$.

questions.questionEn: If the price of an item is first increased by 20% and then decreased by 10%, what is the net percentage change in the price?
questions.questionHi: यदि किसी वस्तु की कीमत में पहले 20% की वृद्धि की जाती है और फिर 10% की कमी की जाती है, तो कीमत में शुद्ध प्रतिशत परिवर्तन क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Let the original price be P. After a 20% increase, the new price is P(1+0.20) = 1.2P. After a 10% decrease, the final price is 1.2P(1-0.10) = 1.2P(0.90) = 1.08P. The net change is an 8% increase.

questions.questionEn: A man sold two bicycles for Rs. 12000 each. On one, he gained 20%, and on the other, he lost 20%. What is his overall gain or loss percentage?
questions.questionHi: एक व्यक्ति ने प्रत्येक 12000 रुपये में दो साइकिलें बेचीं। एक पर उसे 20% का लाभ हुआ और दूसरी पर उसे 20% की हानि हुई। उसका कुल लाभ या हानि प्रतिशत क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: When two articles are sold at the same price, and there is a gain of x% on one and a loss of x% on the other, the overall result is always a loss. The loss percentage is given by $(x/10)^2$. Here, x=20. So, the loss is $(20/10)^2 = 2^2 = 4%$. So there is a 4% loss.

questions.questionEn: A sum of money at simple interest amounts to Rs. 815 in 3 years and to Rs. 854 in 4 years. The sum is:
questions.questionHi: एक राशि साधारण ब्याज पर 3 वर्षों में 815 रुपये और 4 वर्षों में 854 रुपये हो जाती है। वह राशि है:
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: The interest for one year is Rs. $854 - 815 = 39$. The interest for 3 years is Rs. $39 \times 3 = 117$. The principal sum is Rs. $815 - 117 = 698$.

questions.questionEn: The ages of A and B are in the ratio 5:7. Four years ago, their ages were in the ratio 2:3. What are their respective present ages (in years)?
questions.questionHi: A और B की आयु का अनुपात 5:7 है। चार वर्ष पहले, उनकी आयु का अनुपात 2:3 था। उनकी वर्तमान आयु (वर्षों में) क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Let the present ages of A and B be 5x and 7x respectively. Four years ago, their ages were (5x-4) and (7x-4). The ratio was (5x-4)/(7x-4) = 2/3. Solving this gives 3(5x-4) = 2(7x-4) => 15x-12 = 14x-8 => x = 4. Their present ages are 5(4)=20 and 7(4)=28 years.

questions.questionEn: A can do a piece of work in 10 days, and B can do it in 15 days. In how many days will they finish the work if they work together?
questions.questionHi: A एक कार्य को 10 दिनों में कर सकता है, और B इसे 15 दिनों में कर सकता है। यदि वे एक साथ काम करते हैं तो वे कार्य को कितने दिनों में पूरा करेंगे?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: The total work can be assumed as the LCM of 10 and 15, which is 30 units. A's efficiency is 30/10=3 units/day. B's efficiency is 30/15=2 units/day. Their combined efficiency is 3+2=5 units/day. Time taken to complete the work is 30/5=6 days.

questions.questionEn: A train passes a pole in 20 seconds. If the length of the train is 300 meters, what is the speed of the train in km/h?
questions.questionHi: एक ट्रेन 20 सेकंड में एक खंभे को पार करती है। यदि ट्रेन की लंबाई 300 मीटर है, तो ट्रेन की गति किमी/घंटा में क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Speed = Distance/Time = 300 m / 20 s = 15 m/s. To convert m/s to km/h, multiply by 18/5. Speed in km/h = 15 x 18/5 = 3 x 18 = 54 km/h.

questions.questionEn: If x + 1/x = 5, what is the value of x^2 + 1/x^2?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn: The length of the diagonal of a cube is $7\sqrt{3}$ cm. Find its total surface area.
questions.questionHi: एक घन के विकर्ण की लंबाई $7\sqrt{3}$ सेमी है। इसका कुल पृष्ठीय क्षेत्रफल ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: The diagonal of a cube is given by $a\sqrt{3}$, where a is the side length. Given, $a\sqrt{3} = 7\sqrt{3}$, so a = 7 cm. The total surface area of a cube is $6a^2 = 6(7)^2 = 6 \times 49 = 294$ cm$^2$.

questions.questionEn: The angles of a triangle are in the ratio 2:3:5. The triangle is:
questions.questionHi: एक त्रिभुज के कोण 2:3:5 के अनुपात में हैं। त्रिभुज है:
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: The sum of the angles in a triangle is 180°. Let the angles be 2x, 3x, and 5x. $2x+3x+5x = 180° \implies 10x = 180° \implies x = 18°$. The angles are $36°$, $54°$, and $90°$. Since one angle is 90°, it is a right-angled triangle.

questions.questionEn: If $\sin\theta = \frac{3}{5}$, then the value of $\tan\theta$ is:
questions.questionHi: यदि $\sin\theta = \frac{3}{5}$ है, तो $\tan\theta$ का मान है:
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: In a right-angled triangle, if $\sin\theta = \frac{\text{Perpendicular}}{\text{Hypotenuse}} = \frac{3}{5}$, then the Base can be found using the Pythagorean theorem: Base = $\sqrt{5^2-3^2} = \sqrt{25-9} = 4$. So, $\tan\theta = \frac{\text{Perpendicular}}{\text{Base}} = \frac{3}{4}$.

questions.questionEn: The difference between the compound interest and simple interest on a sum for 2 years at 10% per annum is Rs. 50. What is the sum?
questions.questionHi: किसी राशि पर 10% प्रति वर्ष की दर से 2 वर्षों के लिए चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज और साधारण ब्याज के बीच का अंतर 50 रुपये है। वह राशि क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: For 2 years, the difference between CI and SI is given by $P(R/100)^2$. Given, $P(10/100)^2 = 50 \implies P/100 = 50 \implies P = 5000$.

questions.questionEn: A mixture contains milk and water in the ratio 5:3. If 8 litres of milk are added to the mixture, the ratio becomes 7:3. What is the quantity of milk in the original mixture?
questions.questionHi: एक मिश्रण में दूध और पानी का अनुपात 5:3 है। यदि मिश्रण में 8 लीटर दूध मिलाया जाता है, तो अनुपात 7:3 हो जाता है। मूल मिश्रण में दूध की मात्रा क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Let the original quantities of milk and water be 5x and 3x. After adding 8 litres of milk, the ratio becomes $\frac{5x+8}{3x} = \frac{7}{3}$. Cross-multiplying, $3(5x+8)=7(3x) \implies 15x+24=21x \implies 6x=24 \implies x=4$. The original quantity of milk is $5x = 5 \times 4 = 20$ litres.

questions.questionEn: The average of seven consecutive odd numbers is 41. What is the largest number?
questions.questionHi: सात लगातार विषम संख्याओं का औसत 41 है। सबसे बड़ी संख्या क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: For a series of consecutive odd numbers, the average is the middle number. Thus, 41 is the middle (4th) number. The numbers are 35, 37, 39, 41, 43, 45, 47. The largest number is 47.

questions.questionEn: The circumference of a circle is increased by 20%. By what percentage does its area increase?
questions.questionHi: एक वृत्त की परिधि में 20% की वृद्धि की जाती है। इसका क्षेत्रफल कितने प्रतिशत बढ़ता है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: If the circumference increases by 20%, the radius also increases by 20%. The area of a circle is proportional to the square of its radius, $A=\pi r^2$. The percentage increase in area is calculated as $(20 + 20 + \frac{20 \times 20}{100}) = 40 + 4 = 44\%$.

questions.questionEn: If $x + y + z = 12$ and $xy + yz + zx = 42$, what is the value of $x^2 + y^2 + z^2$?
questions.questionHi: यदि $x + y + z = 12$ और $xy + yz + zx = 42$ है, तो $x^2 + y^2 + z^2$ का मान क्या है?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn: The length of the hypotenuse of a right-angled triangle is 13 cm and one of the other two sides is 5 cm. What is the area of the triangle?
questions.questionHi: एक समकोण त्रिभुज के कर्ण की लंबाई 13 सेमी है और अन्य दो भुजाओं में से एक 5 सेमी है। त्रिभुज का क्षेत्रफल क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Using the Pythagorean theorem, the third side (base) is $\sqrt{13^2-5^2} = \sqrt{169-25} = \sqrt{144} = 12$ cm. The area of the triangle is $\frac{1}{2} \times \text{base} \times \text{height} = \frac{1}{2} \times 12 \times 5 = 30$ cm$^2$.

questions.questionEn: If $\tan(A+B) = \sqrt{3}$ and $\tan(A-B) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}$, then what is the value of $A$?
questions.questionHi: यदि $\tan(A+B) = \sqrt{3}$ और $\tan(A-B) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}$ है, तो $A$ का मान क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: From the given equations, $A+B = 60°$ and $A-B = 30°$. Adding the two equations, we get $2A=90° => A=45°$.

questions.questionEn: A shopkeeper buys an article for Rs. 800 and marks it 50% above the cost price. He allows a discount of 20%. What is his profit or loss percentage?
questions.questionHi: एक दुकानदार 800 रुपये में एक वस्तु खरीदता है और उस पर लागत मूल्य से 50% अधिक अंकित करता है। वह 20% की छूट देता है। उसका लाभ या हानि प्रतिशत क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Cost Price (CP) = Rs. 800. Marked Price (MP) = $800 + 50\% \text{ of } 800 = 800 + 400 = 1200$. Discount = 20% of $1200 = 240$. Selling Price (SP) = $1200 - 240 = 960$. Profit = $960 - 800 = 160$. Profit Percentage = $(\frac{160}{800}) \times 100 = 20\%$.

questions.questionEn: What is the average of the first 50 natural numbers?
questions.questionHi: पहले 50 प्राकृतिक संख्याओं का औसत क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: The sum of the first n natural numbers is $n(n+1)/2$. The average is $(n+1)/2$. For n=50, the average is $(50+1)/2 = 51/2 = 25.5$.

questions.questionEn: If $a+b=10$ and $ab=21$, what is the value of $a^3+b^3$?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn: Two pipes A and B can fill a tank in 20 hours and 30 hours respectively. If both pipes are opened together, how long will it take to fill the tank?
questions.questionHi: दो पाइप A और B एक टंकी को क्रमशः 20 घंटे और 30 घंटे में भर सकते हैं। यदि दोनों पाइपों को एक साथ खोला जाए, तो टंकी को भरने में कितना समय लगेगा?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Pipe A fills 1/20 of the tank in one hour. Pipe B fills 1/30 of the tank in one hour. Together, they fill (1/20 + 1/30) = (3+2)/60 = 5/60 = 1/12 of the tank in one hour. So, they will take 12 hours to fill the tank.

questions.questionEn: A circle is inscribed in a square of side 14 cm. What is the area of the circle?
questions.questionHi: एक 14 सेमी भुजा वाले वर्ग में एक वृत्त अंकित है। वृत्त का क्षेत्रफल क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: The diameter of the inscribed circle is equal to the side of the square. So, diameter = 14 cm, and radius = 7 cm. The area of the circle is $\pi r^2 = (22/7) \times 7 \times 7 = 22 \times 7 = 154$ cm$^2$.

questions.questionEn: If $\tan\theta + \cot\theta = 2$, then the value of $\tan^{2024}\theta + \cot^{2024}\theta$ is:
questions.questionHi: यदि $\tan\theta + \cot\theta = 2$ है, तो $\tan^{2024}\theta + \cot^{2024}\theta$ का मान है:
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: The given equation $\tan\theta + \cot\theta = 2$ is only possible if $\tan\theta = 1$ and $\cot\theta = 1$. In this case, $\tan^{2024}\theta + \cot^{2024}\theta = 1^{2024} + 1^{2024} = 1+1=2$.

questions.questionEn: In a right triangle, the sides are in the ratio 3:4:5. If the area of the triangle is 54 cm$^2$, what is the length of the hypotenuse?
questions.questionHi: एक समकोण त्रिभुज में, भुजाएँ 3:4:5 के अनुपात में हैं। यदि त्रिभुज का क्षेत्रफल 54 सेमी$^2$ है, तो कर्ण की लंबाई क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Let the sides of the triangle be 3x, 4x, and 5x. The two sides forming the right angle are 3x and 4x. The area is $\frac{1}{2}(3x)(4x) = 6x^2$. Given, $6x^2 = 54 => x^2 = 9 => x = 3$. The length of the hypotenuse is $5x = 5(3) = 15$ cm.

questions.questionEn: Directions: The following passage has 5 questions. Read the passage carefully and answer the questions that follow. 'Literature is a means of life, it concerns the living essence. It is the vast reservoir of true ideas and emotions. In a world deprived of literature, the broad, the noble, the generous would tend to disappear and life would be correspondingly degraded because the wrong idea and the petty emotion would never feel the upward pull of the ideas and emotions of genius.'
questions.questionHi: निर्देश: निम्नलिखित गद्यांश में 5 प्रश्न हैं। गद्यांश को ध्यानपूर्वक पढ़ें और दिए गए प्रश्नों के उत्तर दें। 'साहित्य जीवन का एक माध्यम है, यह जीवित सार से संबंधित है। यह सच्चे विचारों और भावनाओं का विशाल भंडार है। साहित्य से वंचित दुनिया में, व्यापक, महान और उदार विचार विलुप्त होने लगेंगे और जीवन तदनुसार पतित हो जाएगा क्योंकि गलत विचार और तुच्छ भावनाएं कभी भी प्रतिभा के विचारों और भावनाओं का अनुभव नहीं कर पाएंगी।'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: This is a passage for a comprehension test. The question text and options will be part of the following questions.

questions.questionEn: According to the passage, what would happen if the world were deprived of literature?
questions.questionHi: गद्यांश के अनुसार, यदि दुनिया साहित्य से वंचित हो जाए तो क्या होगा?
options: The broad, noble, generous would disappear
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: As per the passage, in a world without literature, 'the broad, the noble, the generous would tend to disappear and life would be correspondingly degraded'.

questions.questionEn: What does the author mean by the 'upward pull' of genius?
questions.questionHi: लेखक का 'प्रतिभा के ऊपर की ओर खिंचाव' से क्या तात्पर्य है?
options: An ability to elevate thoughts and emotions
A sense of ambition and progress
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The phrase 'upward pull' refers to the ability of the ideas and emotions of genius (found in literature) to elevate or improve the thoughts and feelings of people, preventing them from being petty or wrong.

questions.questionEn: The word 'deprived' in the passage most nearly means:
questions.questionHi: गद्यांश में 'deprived' (वंचित) शब्द का निकटतम अर्थ है:
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: 'Deprived of' means to be without something, or to be lacking. The context 'in a world deprived of literature' means a world lacking literature.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following is an example of a 'petty emotion' according to the passage?
questions.questionHi: गद्यांश के अनुसार 'तुच्छ भावना' का एक उदाहरण निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा है?
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The passage contrasts 'petty emotions' with 'the noble, the generous'. 'Selfishness' is considered a petty emotion.

questions.questionEn: In the following question, a sentence has been given in Active/Passive voice. Out of the four alternatives suggested, select the one which best expresses the same sentence in Passive/Active voice. 'He wrote a letter in verse form to his friend.'
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित प्रश्न में, एक वाक्य सक्रिय/निष्क्रिय (Active/Passive) वाच्य में दिया गया है। दिए गए चार विकल्पों में से, उस एक का चयन करें जो उसी वाक्य को निष्क्रिय/सक्रिय वाच्य में सबसे अच्छी तरह से व्यक्त करता है। 'He wrote a letter in verse form to his friend.'
options: A letter in verse form was written by him to his friend.
A letter in verse form has been written by him to his friend.
A letter in verse form had been written by him to his friend.
A letter in verse form was being written by him to his friend.
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The original sentence is in Simple Past tense (Subject + V2 + Object). The passive voice structure for this is Object + was/were + V3 + by + Subject. Thus, 'A letter in verse form was written by him to his friend.' is the correct form.

questions.questionEn: Select the correct indirect form of the given sentence. 'Mahesh said to Priya, 'How will you pay off your debts?''
questions.questionHi: दिए गए वाक्य का सही अप्रत्यक्ष रूप (indirect form) चुनें। 'Mahesh said to Priya, 'How will you pay off your debts?''
options: Mahesh asked Priya how she would pay off her debts.
Mahesh asked Priya that how she would pay off her debts.
Mahesh asked Priya how she will pay off her debts.
Mahesh asked Priya how would she pay off her debts.
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: For an interrogative sentence with a question word, 'said to' changes to 'asked'. 'How' acts as the conjunction. The tense changes from 'will' to 'would', and the pronouns 'you' and 'your' change to 'she' and 'her' respectively.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word. 'COERCE'
questions.questionHi: दिए गए शब्द का सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त पर्यायवाची चुनें। 'COERCE'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: To 'coerce' someone means to compel or force them to do something. The closest synonym is 'pressurize'.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate antonym of the given word. 'EXPANSION'
questions.questionHi: दिए गए शब्द का सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त विलोम चुनें। 'EXPANSION'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: 'Expansion' means the process of increasing in size. 'Compression' means the action of compressing or pressing something together, thus reducing its size. It is the most appropriate antonym.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom. 'Let the cat out of the bag'
questions.questionHi: दिए गए मुहावरे का सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त अर्थ चुनें। 'Let the cat out of the bag'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The idiom 'let the cat out of the bag' means to reveal a secret accidentally or unintentionally.

questions.questionEn: Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words. 'A person who is fluent in two languages'
questions.questionHi: दिए गए शब्दों के समूह के लिए एक शब्द चुनें। 'A person who is fluent in two languages'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: A 'bilingual' person is someone who can speak two languages fluently.

questions.questionEn: Select the option that contains a grammatical error. 'The workers complained / about the poor accommodation / they were provided / during the tour.'
questions.questionHi: उस विकल्प का चयन करें जिसमें व्याकरण संबंधी त्रुटि है। 'The workers complained / about the poor accommodation / they were provided / during the tour.'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: All parts of the sentence are grammatically correct. Hence, the correct answer is 'No error'.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank. 'The company has the _______ of producing the best cricket balls in the country.'
questions.questionHi: रिक्त स्थान को भरने के लिए सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त विकल्प का चयन करें। 'The company has the _______ of producing the best cricket balls in the country.'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The word 'reputation' fits best in the context, as it refers to the beliefs or opinions that are generally held about someone or something. The company has a good reputation for producing quality products.

questions.questionEn: Select the word which means the same as the group of words given. 'A person, animal, or plant much below the usual height.'
questions.questionHi: दिए गए शब्दों के समूह के लिए एक शब्द चुनें। 'A person, animal, or plant much below the usual height.'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: A 'dwarf' is a person, animal, or plant that is abnormally small due to a genetic or nutritional disorder. It is a common term for beings or things below the usual size.

questions.questionEn: Select the word with the correct spelling.
questions.questionHi: सही वर्तनी वाले शब्द का चयन करें।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The correct spelling is 'calendar'.

questions.questionEn: A passage is given with 5 questions. Read the passage carefully and answer the questions that follow. Passage: Corruption is not a new phenomenon in India. It has been prevalent in society since ancient times. History reveals that it was present even in the Mauryan period. Dishonesty, exploitation, malpractices, scams, and scandals are various manifestations of corruption. The passage discusses corruption and its historical presence.
questions.questionHi: निर्देश: एक गद्यांश के साथ 5 प्रश्न दिए गए हैं। गद्यांश को ध्यानपूर्वक पढ़ें और दिए गए प्रश्नों के उत्तर दें। गद्यांश: भ्रष्टाचार भारत में कोई नई घटना नहीं है। यह प्राचीन काल से ही समाज में प्रचलित रहा है। इतिहास से पता चलता है कि यह मौर्य काल में भी मौजूद था। बेईमानी, शोषण, कुप्रथाएं, घोटाले और कांड भ्रष्टाचार के विभिन्न रूप हैं। यह गद्यांश भ्रष्टाचार और उसकी ऐतिहासिक उपस्थिति पर चर्चा करता है।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: This is a prompt for the cloze test questions that follow. The question and options will be part of the next questions.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank No.1. The company paid her a meager _____. (a) salary (b) allowances (c) rent (d) reward
questions.questionHi: रिक्त स्थान सं. 1 को भरने के लिए सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त विकल्प का चयन करें। The company paid her a meager _____. (a) वेतन (b) भत्ते (c) किराया (d) इनाम
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The word 'meager' describes a small amount of something, in this context, money earned for work. 'Salary' is the most suitable word here, referring to the payment for her work.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank No.2. He allows two successive _____ of 10% and 5%. (a) charges (b) discounts (c) prices (d) taxes
questions.questionHi: रिक्त स्थान सं. 2 को भरने के लिए सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त विकल्प का चयन करें। He allows two successive _____ of 10% and 5%. (a) शुल्क (b) छूट (c) कीमतें (d) कर
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The context mentions percentages being taken off the price, which is the definition of a 'discount'. The use of 'successive' confirms that two price reductions are being applied.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank No.3. Very ambitious people do not like to rest on their _____. (a) laurels (b) mistakes (c) weaknesses (d) friends
questions.questionHi: रिक्त स्थान सं. 3 को भरने के लिए सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त विकल्प का चयन करें। Very ambitious people do not like to rest on their _____. (a) सम्मान (b) गलतियाँ (c) कमजोरियाँ (d) दोस्त
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The idiom 'rest on one's laurels' means to be complacent and satisfied with past achievements, which is the opposite of an ambitious person. The word 'laurels' fits best.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank No.4. Literature is the vast _____ of true ideas and emotions. (a) stream (b) river (c) fountain (d) reservoir
questions.questionHi: रिक्त स्थान सं. 4 को भरने के लिए सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त विकल्प का चयन करें। Literature is the vast _____ of true ideas and emotions. (a) धारा (b) नदी (c) झरना (d) भंडार
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: A 'reservoir' is a large store or supply of something. In the context of the passage, literature is a large collection of ideas and emotions, making 'reservoir' the most fitting word.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank No.5. 'A man with a good _______ can be trusted with anything.' (a) character (b) personality (c) attitude (d) appearance
questions.questionHi: रिक्त स्थान सं. 5 को भरने के लिए सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त विकल्प का चयन करें। 'A man with a good _______ can be trusted with anything.' (a) चरित्र (b) व्यक्तित्व (c) रवैया (d) दिखावट
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The phrase 'can be trusted with anything' suggests integrity and moral quality, which is best represented by the word 'character'. A good character is the foundation of trust.

questions.questionEn: In the following question, a sentence has been given with a part underlined. Select the option that can be used to improve the underlined part. 'He has been trying to solve this problem since two hours.'
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित प्रश्न में, एक वाक्य में एक भाग रेखांकित किया गया है। उस विकल्प का चयन करें जिसका उपयोग रेखांकित भाग को बेहतर बनाने के लिए किया जा सकता है। 'He has been trying to solve this problem since two hours.'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The phrase 'two hours' is a period of time, not a specific point in time. The correct preposition to use with a period of time is 'for', not 'since'. The correct phrase is 'for two hours'.

questions.questionEn: In the following question, a sentence has been given with a part underlined. Select the option that can be used to improve the underlined part. 'If you park your car here, the traffic police has fined you.'
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित प्रश्न में, एक वाक्य में एक भाग रेखांकित किया गया है। उस विकल्प का चयन करें जिसका उपयोग रेखांकित भाग को बेहतर बनाने के लिए किया जा सकता है। 'If you park your car here, the traffic police has fined you.'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: This is a conditional sentence (If-clause). The simple present tense 'park' in the 'if' clause should be followed by the simple future tense 'will fine' in the main clause. The correct phrase is 'will fine you'.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word. 'TRANSIENT'
questions.questionHi: दिए गए शब्द का सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त पर्यायवाची चुनें। 'TRANSIENT'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The word 'transient' means lasting only for a short time. 'Fleeting' has a similar meaning, referring to something that passes swiftly.

questions.questionEn: Select the most appropriate antonym of the given word. 'RIGOROUS'
questions.questionHi: दिए गए शब्द का सर्वाधिक उपयुक्त विलोम चुनें। 'RIGOROUS'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: 'Rigorous' means extremely thorough, exhaustive, or accurate. 'Lax' means not sufficiently strict, severe, or careful, making it the most appropriate antonym.
